In a year where the high profile movies have managed to let us down leave it up to the indie flicks to bright en your day. What started out as a fart joke really surprised me. This captures the adventurous spirit that so many movies have been missing It s not about the end game it s about the process that makes it so great. The exchange that Dano and Radcliffe have is what makes this movie so charming. This had to have been a challenging role for Radcliffe because he has to show emotion without showing emotion. His eyes are lifeless and emotionless but his voice shows so much curiosity and concern The gap is unbelievable and it was truly amusing to watch Dan o's character was also very interesting to see His character grows progressively throughout the movie by interacting with th is dead body. Most of the time you aren t able to figure out if the interaction with t he body is just happening in his mind or for real A lot of the things that Mann y's body can do might be hard to take seriously for some people But if you can get over some of the questionable parts the movie would get you amerced into the the mes that leave you thinking and questioning life and people Â . I can see the c oncept of a fart joke movie could be a turn off for some cinephiles out there but please give this a chance! It is absolutely worth the time. It is a well paced movie with great acting writing and direction All of which is a necessity for great movies !!.
